thread.title: Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: Great service from Tyres on the drive. They had good standard tyres at competitive prices to other bigger branded sites and were able to deal with my car much earlier than them too. I booked on Friday and they were able to come the next day versus a 3 day wait with other garages within a 12 mile radius. To boot they come to you. Booking is free if you have a day to wait in from 8-8 or you can pay for a two hour slot, which I did, and they will call you to organise your slot. You will also get a courtesy call from your fitter 20 or so mins before they arrive. Would recommend.
